exceptions.summary: Thrown when the schema is not a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" />.

Thrown when the resolution is not a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" /> or the resolved type
            is not a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2" /> enumerable.
